metadata.title: Grateful Dead Live at Copps Coliseum on 1990-03-21
metadata.creator: Grateful Dead
metadata.description:
Set 1
Mississippi Half-Step Uptown Toodleloo New Minglewood Blues Far -> From Me Queen Jane Approximately Loose Lucy Victim Or The Crime -> Standing On The Moon -> The Promised Land
Set 2
Hey Pocky Way Crazy Fingers -> Cumberland Blues Estimated Prophet -> He's Gone -> Drums -> Space -> I Need A Miracle -> Wharf Rat -> Throwing Stones -> Turn On Your Lovelight
Encore Knockin' On Heaven's Door
metadata.subject: Ted Gidley;Andrew F
metadata.source: Nakamichi CM300's w/CP-4 shotguns > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell MX-90/100, with no Dolby. Mics on 7-foot stand in front of OTS.
metadata.lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-8 (no Dolby) > Audiophile 2496 > Soundforge > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC
metadata.notes: - Before Queen Jane, Jerry almost starts Must Have Been the Roses. - Patch 5:40 > 5:48 in Drums, taken from MAC that was next in line. - Second Set disc break is seamless.
